mean_cn: n.设计师；  adj.由著名设计师设计的
mean_en: a person whose job is to decide how things such as clothes, furniture, tools, etc. will look or work by making drawings, plans or patterns
sentence: I am a fashion designer; I design clothes for women.
sentence_trans: 我是一个服装设计师，专门设计女装。
word_etyma: design设计 + er名词后缀：人 → designer设计师
